alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:18PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Tooele County through 600 PM MDT... At 516 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northeast of Ibapah, or 35 miles south of Wendover, moving northeast at 20 mph. Additional strong storms are forming south of the main storm. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Utah Test and Training Range South. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
